CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
JUDGES: Egidijus Kūris;Vincent A. De Gaetano;Gabriele Kucsko-Stadlmayer
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought an action against his parents before ORG for dissolution of joint ownership of a real property .

CARDINAL . On DATE the court suspended the proceedings pending the adjudication of a preliminary question in other proceedings . Upon termination of the other proceedings on CARDINAL DATE , ORG continued hearing the case .

CARDINAL . On DATE the court again suspended the proceedings pending the adjudication of a preliminary question in another related procedure . Upon termination of these proceedings on CARDINAL DATE , ORG ordered continuation of the case on DATE .
CARDINAL . An agreement was reached between the parties which was acknowledged and incorporated into a judgment by ORG on DATE .
